options.name: Surefooted
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed. When you make Checks against slipping from terrain or Spell effects, gain a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Free Action : Mark
options.description: You pick a Target that you are aware of but do not need to have Line of Sight on. Any Bonuses from being Hidden, Having Partial Cover or being Invisible are negated until the Start of your next Turn. The first time this Target takes Damage, add an extra 1d8 of that Damage Type.

options.name: Action : Reveal
options.description: Make a Search Check that includes an Area around you with an 8 Unit Radius detecting any Hidden, Invisible or Creatures with Cover.

options.name: Reaction : Flanking Shot
options.description: When an Ally is Ajdacent to a Creature and makes an Attack with a Melee Weapon, you can make an Attack with an Ultra-Light or Light Ranged Weapon at that same Target.
